briefdescription.para: Enum representing the external temperature supported.
Enum representing the supported External sensors.
Typedef to represent the Sensor to be enabled.
Typedef representing the the external temperature sensor..
Typedef to represent the Sensor setup features.
Typedef representing the supported External sensor.
Typedef to represent the Data Collector sampled node information.
This will enable the External Sensor module.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK on success, or an error code otherwise.

listitem.para: Based on setup->Enable value, it will enable the necessary sensors.
ExternalSensor_Setup must have been successful prior.
Do not call this API more than once.

briefdescription.para: This will sample the necessary sensor nodes and update the data.

parameterdescription.para: value The sampled sensor node values. User must provide a valid buffer.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK on success, or an error code otherwise.

listitem.para: ExternalSensor_Setup and ExternalSensor_Enable must have been successful prior.
ExternalSensor_GetData are not thread safe, yet.

briefdescription.para: This will validate if the Sensor is available or not.

parameterdescription.para: External sensor to be validated for availability
Pointer to the availability of the requested sensor availability status

simplesect.para: More than one sensor availability can be validated in single request
RETCODE_OK on success, or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: This will setup the External Sensor module.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Sensor setup feature

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK on success, or an error code otherwise.

listitem.para: This must be the first API to be called if this Sensor feature is to be used.
Enable required sensor which is connected on external board.
Do not call this API more than once.
